analysis.key_quote: This is a terrible policy! By proceeding with this action, the government is weaponizing the Office of Personnel Management to employ only those who espouse loyalty to the Trump administration without regard to the contributions that career federal employees provide to support the operations of this Republic.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and loyalty to the Trump administration, which undermines the contributions of career federal employees.
